Name: Achromatic
About the game: Achromatic is a first-person horror puzzle game where the player takes the role of a hired technician who has been called in to repair a faulty carousel. Upon entering the carnival however, they find that there is more wrong here than a couple loose wires, and they find that the biggest challenge they will have is escaping the carnival in one piece. Features Of This Game Immersive Experience: Prepare for a night at the carnival, don't forget to stop by the carousel before heading into the funhouse! Haunting Environments: Beware of the funhouse, and who lurks inside Terrifying Monsters: Two monstrous enemies who will chase you down
